## Hints.NakedSinglesProvider class

Hint provider for the Naked Singles technique.

A Naked Single occurs when a cell has only one possible candidate value based on the constraints of its row, column, and 3x3 box.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class NakedSinglesProvider extends BaseHintProvider 
```
**Extends:** [BaseHintProvider](./ts-sudoku-lib.hints.basehintprovider.md)
